conbody.p:
Dress code for Operators in the Coating room:
Lab Coats must be worn that extend down to the knee.
Long pants must be worn (no skirts or shorts).
Hair nets must be worn.
Beard covers must be worn by anyone with facial hair.
Socks must be worn.
Shoe covers must be worn unless dedicated shoes (that never leave the clean environment) are available.
No rings or watches shall be worn, and no wallets or cell phones will be allowed.
Surgical gloves should be worn when there is a chance of exposure to the coating liquid.
Surgical gloves should be discarded before leaving the coating room.
